name: CoffeeMaker
0:
”Alexa, ask coffee maker for espresso”
”Alexa, open coffee maker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coffee maker
des:
Skill will ask your name and name of a person who will make you coffee and of course sort of coffee you want to drink. After that Alexa will ask this person to make you your favorite coffee.

Say 'Alexa, help' if you ever get lost.
Say 'Alexa, it's not my name" to change your name

Developer email: andr435@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
